document_data.caption: A map showing Norasil just south of Saikhoi.
document_data.name: Norasil
document_data.mainbody: '''Norasil''', or the '''Lake of Dreams''', was a large lake found in [[Ra-Khati]].
document_data.Geopgraphy: Norasil was situated within the [[Katakoro Shan]] range south of the capital city of [[Saikhoi]]. The lake was fed by the [[Dharbang River]].
